Package sage.app

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractGame
    AbstractGame defines the methods which must be provided by every SAGE-based game.
    BaseGame
    BaseGame provides an implementation of all the methods specified in AbstractGame, except that the BaseGame.initGame() and BaseGame.update(float) methods are empty stubs.
    FixedFrameRateGame
    An abstract class which provides an implementation of a fixed-frame-rate game loop.
    VariableFrameRateGame
